A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Bittersweet...love seeing my favorite Jedi and  crush Luke Skywalker. Great action...too many jokes...bad side was mocked. The Clone War series took it more seriously.\nPhasma? Why even bother\, I was expecting more of the only bad chic in the galaxy. Snoke...Liberace more like it. He was missing the piano.
